name: Mammorest

ability.name: Gaia Crusher
ability.description: Can be ridden. Improves efficiency of cutting trees and mining ores while mounted.

description: The vegetation on its back varies between individuals. There is a long history of appreciating this veritable garden of a Pal, and there are even Mammorest pruning specialists.

skills.name: Sand Blast
skills.description: Hurls sticky mud at an enemy.

skills.name: Seed Machine Gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: Power Bomb
skills.description: Charges a massive amount of energy before firing a large destructive ball.

skills.name: Grass Tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Earth Impact
skills.description: Mammorest's exclusive skill. Uses massive body to shake the earth, dealing damage over a wide area.

skills.name: Spine Vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
